articles.title: Jaguars OFFICIALLY HIRE Urban Meyer as new head coach | CBS Sports HQ - CBS Sports HQ
articles.description: The deal is done. The Jacksonville Jaguars have their next head coach. And his name is Urban Meyer. Hours after reports indicated the former Ohio State coach...
